mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_edoc_sample where use_yn = 'Y'

select sam.sample_no , sam.sample_dot_code , sam.sample_desc , emp.emp_name as emp_name , to_char(sam.create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') create_date from tbl_edoc_sample sam join tbl_employee emp on emp.emp_no = sam.emp_no where sam.use_yn = 'Y' order by sam.sample_no desc
select sample_no, sample_dot_code from tbl_edoc_sample where use_yn = 'Y'
select sample_no, sample_format from tbl_edoc_sample where sample_no = #{sampleNoInt}
select dept_code , dept_upstair , dept_name from tbl_department where use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT a.*, rownum as CREATER FROM ( (SELECT t1.DEPT_CODE as EMP_NO, t1.DEPT_NAME as EMP_NAME, LEVEL as AC_BANK, NVL(t1.DEPT_UPSTAIR, '#') as DEPT_CODE, '' as EMP_GENDER, '' as EMP_RANK, t1.DEPT_NAME as DEPT_NAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_DEPARTMENT WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ) t1 START WITH t1.DEPT_UPSTAIR IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR t1.DEPT_CODE = t1.DEPT_UPSTAIR)
UNION ALL
(SELECT '' || emp.emp_no as EMP_NO, emp.emp_name as EMP_NAME, 9 as AC_BANK, emp.dept_code as DEPT_CODE, 'bi bi-person-circle' as EMP_GENDER, (SELECT comm.nm FROM tbl_common_code comm WHERE comm.cd = emp.emp_rank) as EMP_RANK, (SELECT dep.dept_name FROM tbl_department dep WHERE dep.dept_code = emp.dept_code) as DEPT_NAME FROM tbl_employee emp WHERE emp.use_yn = 'Y' AND emp.emp_no != #{no}) ) a
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_edoc ( EDOC_NO , SAMPLE_NO , EDOC_TITLE , EDOC_CONTENT , EDOC_STARTDATE , EDOC_ENDDATE , EMP_NO ) values ( edoc_no_seq.nextval , #{sampleNo} , #{edocTitle} , #{edocContent} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE + INTERVAL '14' DAY , #{empNo} )

insert into tbl_edoc_attachment ( attach_no , attach_original_filename , attach_rename_filename , file_path , attach_edoc_ref ) values ( attach_no_seq.nextval , #{attachOriginalName} , #{attachRenameFileName} , #{filePath} , edoc_no_seq.currval )

insert into tbl_edoc_approval ( aprvl_no, aprvl_edoc_no, aprvl_rank, aprvl_status, emp_no ) values ( aprvl_no_seq.nextval, edoc_no_seq.currval, #{aprvlRank}, case when #{aprvlRank} = '1' then 'N' else 'W' end, #{empNo} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_edoc edoc join tbl_edoc_approval approval on edoc.edoc_no = approval.aprvl_edoc_no where approval.emp_no = #{no} and approval.aprvl_status = 'N'

SELECT approval.aprvl_no, sam.sample_dot_code AS sample_no, edoc.edoc_title, TO_CHAR(edoc_startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS edoc_startdate, TO_CHAR(edoc_enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS edoc_enddate, emp.emp_name AS emp_name, edoc.edoc_no, CASE WHEN approval.aprvl_status = 'N' THEN '대기' ELSE approval.aprvl_status END AS aprvl_status FROM tbl_edoc edoc JOIN tbl_edoc_approval approval ON edoc.edoc_no = approval.aprvl_edoc_no JOIN tbl_employee emp ON emp.emp_no = edoc.emp_no JOIN tbl_edoc_sample sam ON sam.sample_no = edoc.sample_no WHERE approval.emp_no = #{no} AND approval.aprvl_status = 'N' ORDER BY edoc.edoc_startdate DESC
select count(*) from tbl_edoc edoc join tbl_edoc_approval approval on edoc.edoc_no = approval.aprvl_edoc_no where approval.emp_no = #{no} and approval.aprvl_status = 'W'

SELECT approval.aprvl_no, sam.sample_dot_code AS sample_no, edoc.edoc_title, TO_CHAR(edoc_startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS edoc_startdate, TO_CHAR(edoc_enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS edoc_enddate, emp.emp_name AS emp_name, edoc.edoc_no, CASE WHEN approval.aprvl_status = 'W' THEN '예정' ELSE approval.aprvl_status END AS aprvl_status FROM tbl_edoc edoc JOIN tbl_edoc_approval approval ON edoc.edoc_no = approval.aprvl_edoc_no JOIN tbl_employee emp ON emp.emp_no = edoc.emp_no JOIN tbl_edoc_sample sam ON sam.sample_no = edoc.sample_no WHERE approval.emp_no = #{no} AND approval.aprvl_status = 'W' ORDER BY edoc.edoc_startdate DESC
select count(*) from tbl_edoc edoc join tbl_edoc_approval approval on edoc.edoc_no = approval.aprvl_edoc_no where approval.emp_no = #{no} and approval.aprvl_status = 'Y'

SELECT approval.aprvl_no, sam.sample_dot_code AS sample_no, edoc.edoc_title, TO_CHAR(edoc_startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS edoc_startdate, TO_CHAR(final_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS final_date, emp.emp_name AS emp_name, edoc.edoc_no, CASE WHEN approval.aprvl_status = 'Y' THEN '완료' ELSE approval.aprvl_status END AS aprvl_status FROM tbl_edoc edoc JOIN tbl_edoc_approval approval ON edoc.edoc_no = approval.aprvl_edoc_no JOIN tbl_employee emp ON emp.emp_no = edoc.emp_no JOIN tbl_edoc_sample sam ON sam.sample_no = edoc.sample_no WHERE approval.emp_no = #{no} AND approval.aprvl_status = 'Y' ORDER BY edoc.edoc_startdate DESC
select count(*) from tbl_edoc edoc where emp_no = #{no} and edoc_status = 'S'

select count(*) from tbl_edoc edoc where emp_no = #{no} and edoc_status = 'O'

select edoc.edoc_no, sam.sample_dot_code as sample_no, edoc.edoc_title, to_char(edoc_startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') edoc_startdate, to_char(final_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') final_date, emp.emp_name as emp_name, CASE WHEN edoc.edoc_status = 'F' THEN '승인' ELSE edoc.edoc_status END AS edoc_status from tbl_edoc edoc join tbl_employee emp on emp.emp_no = edoc.emp_no join tbl_edoc_sample sam on sam.sample_no = edoc.sample_no where edoc.emp_no = #{no} and edoc_status = 'F' order by edoc.edoc_startdate desc
select count(*) from tbl_edoc edoc where emp_no = #{no} and edoc_status = 'R'

select edoc.edoc_no, sam.sample_dot_code as sample_no, edoc.edoc_title, to_char(edoc_startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') edoc_startdate, to_char(final_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') final_date, emp.emp_name as emp_name, CASE WHEN edoc.edoc_status = 'R' THEN '반려' ELSE edoc.edoc_status END AS edoc_status from tbl_edoc edoc join tbl_employee emp on emp.emp_no = edoc.emp_no join tbl_edoc_sample sam on sam.sample_no = edoc.sample_no where edoc.emp_no = #{no} and edoc_status = 'R' order by edoc.edoc_startdate desc
select count(*) from tbl_edoc edoc where emp_no = #{no} and edoc_status = 'T'

select edoc.edoc_no, sam.sample_dot_code as sample_no, edoc.edoc_title, to_char(edoc_startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') edoc_startdate, to_char(edoc_enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') edoc_enddate, emp.emp_name as emp_name, CASE WHEN edoc.edoc_status = 'T' THEN '회수' ELSE edoc.edoc_status END AS edoc_status from tbl_edoc edoc join tbl_employee emp on emp.emp_no = edoc.emp_no join tbl_edoc_sample sam on sam.sample_no = edoc.sample_no where edoc.emp_no = #{no} and edoc_status = 'T' order by edoc.edoc_startdate desc
